statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 11 \\ 1 \\ 8 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 2 \\ 6 \\ 8 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ 3 \\ -15 \\ -15 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 14 \\ 2 \\ 11 \\ -6 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
